propagation Package¶

Numerical light propagation.

Computes light propagation from one known set of points to another set using the convolution algorithm.

Propagation is used primarily for one operation:

  1. Image or VectorGrid (Electric field) =-> Image, Volume or VectorGrid at another position

holopy.propagate depends on holopy.core

holopy.propagation.convolution_propagation.propagate(data, d, gradient_filter=False)¶

Propagates a hologram along the optical axis

Parameters :

data : Image or VectorGrid

Hologram to propagate

d : float or list of floats

Distance to propagate, in meters, or desired schema. A list tells to propagate to several distances and return the volume

gradient_filter : float

For each distance, compute a second propagation a distance gradient_filter away and subtract. This enhances contrast of rapidly varying features
Returns :

data : Image or Volume

The hologram progagated to a distance d from its current location.
